schema.title: Atomic Overwrite Log Policies Request
schema.description: In an atomic operation delete all existing log policies and create the provided list by order.

schema.title: Atomic Overwrite Span Policies Request
schema.description: In an atomic operation delete all existing span policies and create the provided list by order.

schema.title: Atomic Batch Create Policy Request
schema.description: This data structure is used to create multiple policies atomically.

schema.title: Bulk Test Log Policies Request
schema.description: Request to test multiple log policies.

schema.title: Reorder Policies Request
schema.description: This data structue is used to reorder policies.

schema.title: Toggle Policy Request
schema.description: This data structue is used to toggle a policy by its ID.
